column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////If you're looking to have a physical reaction to food - a good one
column2: I mean - this is spot to hit. Now
column3: I love tapas because it gives a food lover like me the opportunity to try all sorts of food in one sitting
column4: and that's exactly what you should do. The sangria is delicious
column6: and the flan is divine. The decor is cheesy and it's a little pricey (but I'm poor
column8: but the waitstaff is friendly and I guarantee you'll leave happy ... and stuffed.
